thought.text: Excellent! All edge cases pass. Now let me check if there are any existing tests that might need to be updated due to the change in error messages:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpr5a8owwj/astropy && grep -r "expected.*as the first column.*but found" astropy/timeseries/tests/

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmpr5a8owwj/astropy && grep -r \"expected.*as the first column.*but found\" astropy/timeseries/tests/", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
